name: Multiple Choice
oracle_text:
If X is 1, scry 1, then draw a card.
If X is 2, you may choose a player. They return a creature they control to its owner's hand.
If X is 3, create a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token.
If X is 4 or more, do all of the above.

name: Multiple Choice
oracle_text:
If X is 1, scry 1, then draw a card.
If X is 2, you may choose a player. They return a creature they control to its owner's hand.
If X is 3, create a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token.
If X is 4 or more, do all of the above.

name: Tanazir Quandrix
oracle_text:
Flying, trample
When Tanazir Quandrix enters the battlefield, double the number of +1/+1 counters on target creature you control.
Whenever Tanazir Quandrix attacks, you may have the base power and toughness of other creatures you control become equal to Tanazir Quandrix's power and toughness until end of turn.

name: Stonebinder's Familiar
oracle_text: Whenever one or more cards are put into exile during your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Stonebinder's Familiar. This ability triggers only once each turn.
flavor_text:
"Hey, my great-great-grandfather had a dog just like that!"
—Dradiel, Lorehold mage-student

card_faces.name: Wandering Archaic
card_faces.oracle_text: Whenever an opponent casts an instant or sorcery spell, they may pay {2}. If they don't, you may copy that spell. You many choose new targets for the copy.

card_faces.name: Wandering Archaic
card_faces.oracle_text: Whenever an opponent casts an instant or sorcery spell, they may pay {2}. If they don't, you may copy that spell. You many choose new targets for the copy.

name: Mage Hunter
oracle_text: Whenever an opponent casts or copies an instant or sorcery spell, they lose 1 life.
flavor_text: One of the Oriq's most powerful tools is the mage hunter, a vile monstrosity created to seek out and snuff out the arcane.

name: Make Your Mark
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. When that creature dies this turn, create a 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.
flavor_text: Those who do learn from history may still choose to repeat it.

name: Explosive Welcome
oracle_text: Explosive Welcome deals 5 damage to any target and 3 damage to any other target. Add {R}{R}{R}.
flavor_text: Rowan and Will were a natural fit in Prismari College, the school of outrageous elemental arts.

name: Solve the Equation
oracle_text: Search your library for an instant or sorcery card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Zimone's brilliance drew attention from many, including the sinister mages known as the Oriq.

name: Creative Outburst
oracle_text:
Creative Outburst deals 5 damage to any target. Look at the top five cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on he bottom of your library in a random order.
{u/r}{u/r}, Discard Creative Outburst: Create a Treasure token.
